entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon then periods of snow. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
